code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useCart}from'../Pages/CartContext';import{motion,AnimatePresence}from'framer-motion';import'./FloatingCartIcon.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FloatingCartIcon=()=>{const{CartCount,cartItems}=useCart();const iconSize=35+Math.min(CartCount*5,35);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"floating-cart-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/cart",style:{textDecoration:'none'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-icon-wrapper",style:{width:`${iconSize}px`,height:`${iconSize}px`,fontSize:`${iconSize-10}px`},children:["\uD83D\uDED2",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AnimatePresence,{children:cartItems.map(image=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.img,{src:image.image,alt:"Item",style:{position:'absolute',width:'15px',height:'15px',objectFit:'contain',zIndex:-1},initial:image.direction==='in'?{y:-50,opacity:0}:{y:0,opacity:1},animate:image.direction==='in'?{y:0,opacity:1}:{y:-50,opacity:0},exit:{y:-50,opacity:0},transition:{duration:0.6}},image.id))}),CartCount>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart-badge",children:CartCount})]})})});};export default FloatingCartIcon;
